Author: fr0gcodes
Text: i'm really, really proud of you for being in recovery for a year and half. that shit is HARD. getting to a healthy weight is really fucking hard. your friend really sounds like she's romanticizing her ED. i mean, "thin and svelte and erudite"? what the absolute fuck? i'm so sorry you have to deal with this. maybe consider taking a break from this friend because what you're describing sounds super toxic and detrimental to your recovery. you've gotten this far, you can do this!! keep going, i know it's so hard but i believe in you
